index.intro: We are an FRC Team located at Istanbul, Turkey.

outreach.text: We strive to share our passion for STEAM with our local community.

media.text: We document and showcase our team's progress through the season.

sponsors.text: We thank our sponsors for supporting our team and helping us achieve our mission.
